attributes.action: Ban TV shows having competitions which are a lottery as there is no skill involved.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Ban all competitions on TV shows which are not a competition but are a lottery. They usually are fronted by a TV personality & give a choice of 3 answers, the correct one being obvious Eg- Which of these animals barks-
a) A mouse.
b) A cat.
c) A dog.
The sole reason for the competition is to raise revenue because to answer the question, you have to use premium rate telephone numbers or texts- and these raise considerably more than the prize offered.
They are a symptom of today's scam society, which has permeated throughout life today and would be one small step to rectify this.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
